emails.subject: Hey [First Name], we've noticed you've been away...
emails.preview_text: We miss having you around! Here's what you've been missing...

emails.subject: See what you've been missing! 🌟
emails.preview_text: We've made some exciting changes since you've been away

emails.subject: Here's 20% off to welcome you back! 🎁
emails.preview_text: We miss you! Enjoy this exclusive discount before it expires

emails.subject: How Sarah turned her life around (and you can too)
emails.preview_text: A real story of transformation that will inspire you to take action today

emails.subject: 💔 This is goodbye (unless you click)
emails.preview_text: We hate goodbyes, but we need to know if you still want to hear from us
